Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I purchased this for my son overseas as he had broken the screen on his last one. When he opened it he was amazed at the size and weight of this one. He also was very elated that all his books that he purchased immediately downloaded to the new one with his bookmarks in place. All in all a great purchase from an excellent company.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Love my Kindle Voyage. The size is much smaller than my older Kindle and the weight is much less. This helps as I take fm Kindle everywhere. Love the touch screen features.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Got this product for a relative for christmas who had a kindle fire and was looking for an upgrade. With how far technology has grown on phones she was only looking for a reader and something that was lighter on her thumbs when reading then her kindle fire. This product was not only lighter on her thumbs but also worked great in any light.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Always great to upgrade new from old version when the staff is always knowledgeable

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Love this ereader; very convenient. Very easy to use.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: This is the best Kindle yet and I am loving it! For someone who suffers from eye strain but loves to read, the 300 dpi image resolution and the liquid ink technology are beyond compare. Buy it, you won't regret it!!

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Bought this reader for a present for my mom. She loves it. Able to take her book with her in a smaller form loves how it looks like paper pages. Easy to order a new book.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: This is an very good to use in all areas. The letters are very clear.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I like this Kindle, but I am not sure it is worth the premium over the Paperwhite. I previously had a Kindle Fire, which was fine, but this is definitely nicer for reading. But it all depends on what you need it for, and how often you will use it.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I had been reading on my iPad mini most of the time, but around the pool or at the beach, that was almost impossible. The Voyage is great not only in bright sunshine but inside, even in a pretty dark room. The back light is great for just about any environment. The battery life is fantastic.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Great product love the auto adjusting black lightLove the weight of the kindle light enough I can hold it with one hand an turn the pages

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I like the small, light weight size, and the adaptive lighting. But the page turning is too sensitive, skipping ahead many pages when I am just moving the Kindle, and going back and then forward when I am trying to change just one page.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Nice, nice, nice, nice, nice, nice, nice, nice, nice

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: My husband loves his new kindle. Lightweight, fast, and the origami cover is great.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Great product. Would recommend it to others to buy.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: My Kindle Voyage is nearly 16 months old and worked perfectly. I kept receiving emails from Amazon about the software update. I switched off airplane mode, switched on wifi and shortly after the screen locked up. I have tried everything with customer support and they now tell me I will have to buy a new one. I am very annoyed. If I had left the software as it was my Kindle Voyage would still be working.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: This is our first Kindle, we are learning how to operate it, so far it has been quite easy and enjoyable to use

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I have always been an avid paper book reader. Never thought I could convert! Purchased the Kindle at Best Buy and I am totally hooked! Love the convenience as well as simp,e access to books (inexpensive) on line.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: the screen flush with the sides is great. The glass feeling is really nice. I don't use the side buttons for page turning but only because of habit. They are great and the need for pressure allows me to hold the kindle without changing pages. But, the price is painful. It is a splurge purchase since the paperwhite is just about as good in nearly every respect.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: This readeri is compact and fits nicely in my bag. Easy to use, controls for children are very effective. Am glad I bought it.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: easy to read, great product When I use different readers they keep tract of where I am in each.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Easily the best one of the various kindles I have had.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Works better than I anticipated.....now I don't need ambient light. Easy to use and read.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Having had several models of Kindle readers, I can say that this is the best yet and is definitely worth the extra cost.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I exchanged the paper white that I had bought for this Voyage. This is thinner, lighter and just easier to hold than the paperwhite. Still getting used to the archive system since I had a Nook before, bit of a learning curve. But I like the Kindle interface better than the Nook, the book suggestions and shopping for books is much better. The only thing I miss is that the Kindle doesn't tell you what % battery you have left, it just shows you the bar in the battery symbol.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I think this is a great ereader, I think even better than the Oasis that just came out. I do like that one but I love that this one seems sturdier and offers the automatic brightness adjustment and the vibration feedback when turning pages. One thing I didnt like was that it was hard to find where the page turn areas were at while reading in the dark. To remedy this, I bought a few aluminum button stickers and put them on the lines of the device

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I love the auto dim feature for reading at night! I have no problem reading in sunlight either. Can be held with one hand and turn the page with the same hand. I have 3 other kindles and I use this one all the time.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I will start off with the fact that I like paper books a lot. I bought the e reader because it's light and can travel with multiple books. The interface is fairly easy to use and it holds a lot of books. The automatic light feature doesn't work as nicely as I would. Overall I am happy with the purchase but there are features that could make it a 5.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: Love it, love it!!! Have had several different models. like this one the best. The Kindle Fire was nice but had a hard time reading at night.

Product: Kindle Paperwhite E-reader - White, 6 High-Resolution Display (300 ppi) with Built-in Light, Wi-Fi - Includes Special Offers,,
Review_Summary: I had the paperwhite, but this voyage is definitely better. The quality is better, screen is seamless with the edge, which makes it feel premium and delivers more comfortable reading experience. Lighter than the paperwhite, love the pressure sensors to change pages. Overall better experience reading experience than the paperwhite.
